评论概述: 4XL purchased after reading comments, Still small in arms
评论详情: Honestly the jacket is nice, fit the chest and waist with room to spare, but as another mentioned, the arms are not big enough. You would think that the scaling would take affect all the way through... just started the return effort. Hopefully this goes well. update on this process to come
Looks way better in the picture than it does in person…and it doesn’t fit well either. I returned this product twice. The first time, I thought it was the size that was the issue but it wasn’t.
Well I like the jacket but it ain't as thick as I thought.
The jacket overall fits okay. I'm a bigger guy so I'm glad it fits around my belly and chest. My only concern was that the sleeves are a bit tight on my arms.
Ordered the Black and Gold varsity jacket. It was more of a brown color. Definitely not anywhere close to being a gold color. Call it what it is BLACK AND BROWN.
Nice fit a little snug in the arms. If you want a looser fit I would size up.
It has my school colors of red and black. Now I'm searching from a Bulldawg patch to add to it

评论概述: Good for the price.  Runs small.
评论详情: I works for what I wanted (A one of a kind Bulls letterman jacket).  Only problem is it’s obviously cheap and you can feel it on the felt/fabric part.  It continuously sheds. The inner lining is VERY thin and rips away from the jacket easily.  It’s not terrible but now that I added the patches and it’s a nice design, I’m afraid the jacket itself just won’t hold up.

And you get what you pay for... only in this case, it's priced too high. Main body of jacket looks and feels like felt. Faux leather is basically viscuine. This is not the letterman jacket for me or you.
Every boy who has a letter wants a varsity jacket.  My son's had this jacket andnow my grandson.  Colors are bright and true.
I designed a Wisconsin Badgers jacket with purchased patches and it came out great. This is a good quality jacket that fits well.

No disrepect to the coat I wanted it really bad! I learned that with such a coat I would be best served going to a professional tailor. If I tried to send in my own measurements it would have been a disgrace to a very nice jacket.

评论概述: These jackets run very small, I ordered a 2x and it fit like a medium
评论详情: Jacket was too small. Nice material though

The Jacket was made of good quality it was exactly what was ordered...if your ordering they run small so I suggest you order at least two sizes up from your normal size. The customer service was great they contacted me and took care of a small issue that I had I would definitely order from this company and highly suggest it to anyone

评论概述: Xsmall fits a 10 year old 70lb boy
评论详情: My 10 yr old wanted this. I was scared it was going to be to big. It was perfect for him! He got an x-small mens.
